text: Shekie Kongo (born 13 June 1949) is a Malawian former boxer. Shekie competed in the light flyweight event at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich. Standing at under five feet tall, he was the smallest man in the boxing tournament and a favourite with the crowd. Kongo was given a bye in the first round, but was defeated in round two by his Ethiopian opponent Chanyalev Haile. ==References== Category:Malawian male boxers Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Light-flyweight boxers Category:Olympic boxers of Malawi Category:Boxers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Malawi Category:Boxers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games
title: Shekie Kongo
